class BOOTSTRAP_STATIC_ASSERT_MANGLE_LINE_NUMBER( bootstrap_static_assert_fail_class ) { \
                inline void fail()                                                                      \
                {                                                                                                       \

unsigned int GetCharLenUTF8 ( const char *  chr  ) 

returns NULL if the terminating char was hit.

null terminator?

return the character len.

must be a single byte character. If not, this wasn't a pointer to a valid UTF-8 character. Either way, we'll return 1.

Definition at line 167 of file common_afx.h.

void* TempAlloc ( unsigned int  size  ) 

temporary memory allocation

allocates memory from a temporary pool if possible. If the pool is already in use, this function returns memory allocated on the heap. The memory returned by this function is guaranteed to be aligned to a 16-byte boundary.

could we gain ownership over the temporary memory? If so, simply return it.

Definition at line 344 of file common_afx.cpp.

void TempFree ( void *  mem  ) 

Definition at line 355 of file common_afx.cpp.

void VSPrintF ( tstring &  out,
const char *  fmt,
va_list  marker 
)

utility functions.

utility functions.

global functions

mingw and glibc<2.1 return -1 when the string doesn't fit so we have to try again with a bigger buffer

c99/glibc>=2.1 return the actual size of the final string whether it fits or not, so we can just use that directly

otherwise, string fit so we are done

Definition at line 39 of file common_afx.cpp.
